text: mosega baegseong-ege malhagil hananim-ui eunhyeleul gieoghala geubun-i neo huileul palao baegseong-eulobuteo guhasyeossnola geudeul-eun neohuileul museoun hagdae lo goelobhyeoss-euni yeoadeul-eun geudaelo dueoss-euna nam-adeul-eun hagsalhayeoss-eumae geugeos-eun neohui junimkkeseo naelisin keo dalan siheom-ieossnola
